plot: When Marge tries to buy Homer snack cakes for their anniversary, she winds up meeting a married man who shares a common love of British television.

To celebrate their wedding anniversary Homer does up a playground train ride Marge liked but, as he keeps it a secret from her, she thinks he has forgotten it and allows herself to go onto a dating web site for married people. Here she meets Ben, who shares her love of British television period dramas but resists his request that they go away together, her loyalty being rewarded when she sees the newly-restored train.—don @ minifie-1
